title: Is It worth to live in Hostel or should i go for PG outside RR campus ?
content:
I am joining PES RR campus for MCA 2 year program and have doubts about hostel accommodation, because my budget is quiet low for hostel but still i want to know if its better to take hostel or PG.

Thanks in Advance!

comments.body: If you do the calculations hostel does seem to be cheaper than compared to staying outside, but you end up spending more on outside food when you are in hostel so in the end it tallies up with the cost of staying outside. People join hostel for the convience factor . You can live on a budget staying outside.
